package.description:
This repository contains the Las Vegas Reconstruction Toolskit. We are temporary using this until we reach a stable version and will then create a Debian package that will be uploaded to our own package mirror. After a successfull compile you need to tell your ros package 'lvr_tools' this working path. Just run the following command: # echo "export LVR_PATH=/path/to/meshing.pg2013" >> ~/.bashrc
This issue will be solved by creating a .deb package, meanwhile we just need to accept it... ;-)
package.author: Thomas Wiemann, Henning Deeken, Simon Herkenhoff
